attributes.action: publish any guidelines held by government offices that show how the data protection act is implemented, and then explain EXACTLY how this child bennifit fiasco could have occured and fire those responsible for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The loss of personal personal data in 25 million child benifit records "in the post" is not a reasonable explaination. There is a clear breach of the data protection act. I want to see (seeing as the government works for, and answers to the people...not the other way around) what policies the government has in place in its offices to ensure the flow of data is secure, and after this has been done I want to know why these procedures were not followed, and who is responsible for it. It is never a breakdown in communication, it is someone who is not doing their job!
